chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 12 has the above problem: 
Hello I wanted to ask if my phone is already on its way or has been sent
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

The customer contacts us because his order has not yet been shipped.

Is there a reason for this?

If not, please ship the order within 24 hours, or we will have to initiate a refund.

Thank you in advance for your cooperation

Regards,
Tania from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We extend our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience caused. It has come to our attention that the parcel may have been stolen. We take such incidents very seriously and have launched an extensive internal inquiry to ascertain the circumstances surrounding this unfortunate event. As a gesture of our commitment to customer satisfaction and to alleviate any inconvenience caused, we have promptly refunded the customer in full for their order.

Regards,
TB
